text: Sandra Gould (July 23, 1916 â€“ July 20, 1999) was an American actress, known for her role as Gladys Kravitz on the sitcom Bewitched. Gould was the second actress to portray the role, debuting at the start of the third season. She died on July 20, 1999, three days before her 83rd birthday. title: Sandra Gould
